message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can only pay $9500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to pay $9750?  This would be a great deal for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm willing to consider $9600 as a fair price for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
